page.title: 02HADEN HILL LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: {Haden Hill leisure Centre}is situated to the S.W. of Cradley Heath in the old grounds of{Haden Hall.}The centre has two swimming pools,three squash courts ,two sports halls,a weight- lifting room,a sauna and a bar.These provide venues for karate lessons, 5-a-side tournaments,a dieting club and old time dancing. When we carried out a street survey we found that 48% of a mixed age range group used the centre. Most peoples spare time is taken up by watching television, but 46% go to the cinema once a month,63% go to a pub at least once a week and 70% go weekly to some recreational activity. Most people were satisfied with the recreational facilities provided in the area.However,a few did feel that there was a need for more childrens facilities.
